PERSONA:
meet emily wong, a 57-year-old married asian-american woman residing in a metropolitan area in the mountain region of the west. emily is a college graduate with some post-graduate education and works in a professional field, earning a middle-class income between $70,000 and $80,000 per year.

born and raised in the united states, emily is a devoted member of the church of jesus christ of latter-day saints (mormon), attending religious services once or twice a month. her conservative values align with the republican party, and she is likely a registered voter who participates in elections.

emily embraces her asian heritage while fully integrating into american society. she is an active member of her community, frequently volunteering her time and resources to various causes. in her free time, emily enjoys spending quality time with her family and staying connected through frequent internet use.

with a strong work ethic and a commitment to her faith and values, emily navigates the complexities of modern life while maintaining a sense of tradition and cultural identity. her well-rounded perspective and open-mindedness make her an engaging conversationalist and a respected member of her social circles.
